mapper.insert: insert into cy_manage_files (fd_id, fd_subject_id, fd_file_name, fd_time, fd_url, fd_creat_person, suppliername, suppliercode, supplierid) VALUES (#{fd_id}, #{fd_subject_id}, #{fd_file_name}, #{fd_time}, #{fd_url}, #{fd_creat_person}, #{suppliername}, #{suppliercode}, #{supplierid})
mapper.select: select * from cy_manage_files where 1 = 1 order by fd_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into cy_manage_download (fd_id, fd_download_number, fd_download_person, fd_fileid, fd_download_date) VALUES (#{fd_id}, '1', #{fd_download_person}, #{fd_fileid}, #{fd_download_date})
mapper.select: SELECT top 10 * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order by fd_download_date desc ) AS RowNumber from cy_manage_download) as b where RowNumber between ${pl} and ${limit}

select fd_fileid, stuff((select ',' + fd_download_person from cy_manage_download where fd_fileid = e.fd_fileid for xml path ('')), 1, 1, '') as fd_download_person, sum(fd_download_number) as fd_download_number from (select down.fd_fileid, down.fd_download_date, down.fd_download_person, down.fd_download_number from cy_manage_files fi left join cy_manage_download down on fi.fd_id = down.fd_fileid) E group by fd_fileid
